div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

ul.li:
Include ces codes sont définis dans 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.8.2.1
CodeDisplay
1376pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
1377pTis: Carcinoma in situ
1378pT1: Tumor limited to one subsite of supraglottis with normal vocal cord mobility
1379pT2: Tumor invades mucosa of more than one adjacent subsite of supraglottis or glottis or region outside the supraglottis (eg, mucosa of base of tongue, vallecula, medial wall of pyriform sinus) without fixation of the larynx
1380pT3: Tumor limited to larynx with vocal cord fixation and/or invades any of the following: postcricoid area, preepiglottic space, paraglottic space, and/or inner cortex of thyroid cartilage
1381pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor invades through the thyroid cartilage and/or invades tissues beyond the larynx (eg, trachea, soft tissues of neck including deep extrinsic muscle of tongue, strap muscles, thyroid, or esophagus)
1382pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades prevertebral space, encases carotid artery, or invades mediastinal structures
1392pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
1393pTis: Carcinoma in situ
1394pT1: Tumor limited to subglottis
1395pT2: Tumor extends to vocal cord(s) with normal or impaired mobility
1396pT3: Tumor limited to larynx with vocal cord fixation
1397pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor invades cricoid or thyroid cartilage and/or invades tissues beyond the larynx (eg, trachea, soft tissues of neck including deep extrinsic muscles of the tongue, strap muscles, thyroid, or esophagus)
1398pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades prevertebral space, encases carotid artery, or invades mediastinal structures

publisher.value: Agence du Numérique en Santé(ANS) -2 - 10 Rue d'Oradour-sur-Glane, 75015 Paris
